website_summaries.verdict: Noted for being a good value for the price, this cleaner is easy to use and works well, even on stubborn stains.
pros: Consumers report that this spot cleaner is lightweight, easy to use, and has excellent cleaning power
They also praise it for holding up well up over months – even years – of use
cons: A few  problems with motor burning out

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Read negative reviews carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. I read a lot of ignorant reviews. 1. Empty between uses. 2. It only gets things as clean as soap and water will. A friend has had one for years with great results. Used it to revitalize a sofa.... great
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this product weekly for pet messes and I find that is does what it is supposed to. I am a bit concerned about how long it will last. My two issues are that it is extremely loud ( louder than my vacuum cleaner) and that there is no way to clean the area inside the nozzle-
customer_reviews.author: Bianca ReaganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean, stinky
customer_reviews.text: It cleans up messes well enough, but the accumulated pet hair it suctions up, gets trapped in the suctioning tool and the dirty water tank, which I have found to be impossible to clean out. The residual odor from the dirty water tank not being able to be taken apart and cleaned thoroughly is really gross. If anyone knows of a solution, I'd appreciate knowing it. Otherwise, I'm throwing this away after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This spot cleaner works well, but my issues are, that the hose is too short, which requires a lot of bending over, and the other issue is that it has no wheels, making it difficult to move it from one place to another. When the tank is full, it can be too heavy and awkward to carry. A half tank of water and solution is more than enough to clean my apartment, which makes this cleaner reliable for my needs. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: This machine did a fantastic job on my living room area rug
customer_reviews.text: This machine did a fantastic job on my living room area rug. I recently paid $100 for a carpet cleaning company to come and clean my 5×9 rug and then my dog continuously peed on it. I definitely think this machine did better than theirs, as the water came out black and it's only been a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Becca D.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: We have a new puppy and we’re looking for something to help clean up urine stains. I followed the directions perfectly and even pretreated the stains. The photo is after SEVERAL cleaning attempts. The stains are still bright yellow and smell of urine. This is not the best in my opinion for pet stains. I did like that it was easy to put together and use, but I will be returning as we need something better at removing the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Wish I bought it years ago!!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is AMAZING. I’ve included before/after pictures. The before picture was what was left after 30 mins of cleaning using a carpet spray - WEEKS ago. I tried out the machine today and this is the result after maybe 2 mins!! I had 2 other worse spots that I cleaned first and was so excited about it, I didn’t think to take pictures! The machine was super simple to assemble and it was quick and easy to use! I should have purchased this years ago!! I’m tossing all other carpet cleaners and using this alone going forward. If it was able to clean weeks old spots, I have no doubt in its ability cleaning right after a spill.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last week and it smells funny when running the motor. There is also no way to get out hair and other things aside from liquid in the dirty water tank. If you have hair this is not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: eml

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my small Yorkie puppy accidents and some random juice stains, etc. All very small things. It leaks, nothing was done different to it but a few weeks later it has a random leak from the cleaning power liquid side underneath the base. It holds water/formula from the plastic containers inside the machine itself, and then leaks it through the bottom of the machine. All screws we're tight. The suction could also be better. It leaves spot very wet and still leaves pee smell after once dried. Very sad spent so much on this. If I can exchange it I'd def will change review.
customer_reviews.author: Starstress

customer_reviews.title: Has almost no suction or cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: I should have known when the video reviews only showed wet spills being cleaned up that this product was not going to work. I bought it assuming it would not just suck up wet spills but also actually clean dirt out of a rug. It did not. I'm not sure what the cleaning product is that they include, but it did not get any stains out of my rug at all. Also, the suction on the hose was almost non-existent and I had to press down ridiculously hard to get it to suck up anything. I don't know if I can return this once it's been used, but I hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fields

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second one for Lakehouse
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one we purchased. They work very well for the price. I do wish there was a better way to clean the collection tank. Always looks a little bit dirty. But a pretty minor detail. We use it for dog urine... Probably too much information but just wanted people to know that having plastic part is actually better than metal that can be corroded. I don’t usually use the reservoir tank I just spray vinegar water on the floor and use the green machine to soak it up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Suck up dirty water the way it supposed to and the suction is terrible never again
customer_reviews.text: I am highly disappointed in this product. I wasted my money on something that I thought would clean my rugs and it turns out it only does half the job. It does not Suck up dirty water the way it supposed to and the suction is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Paws

customer_reviews.title: ...it's a little worrisome...
customer_reviews.text: ....how much I love this machine. Not crazy about Bissell cleaners but the machine itself is just what I needed. I bought it as an alternative to rolling up, transporting, and paying high fees to have our large area rugs cleaned...in addition to our car's interior. I place towels under the rug, just in case it went through to the hard wood floors, and when we were done, the towels were dry...great suction!! I couldn't tell a difference in our car's interior - until the next day after they had fully dried and the stains were gone!! Very very happy with this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad but a few design flaws
customer_reviews.text: A few design flaws from Bissell IMO, but I'm using this on a daily basis and you kinda get what you pay for. The hose is short and the placement of it is annoying to deal with at times. Dirty tank is a bit of a pain to properly clean and so is the head on the attachment. Make sure to vacuum up pet hair, chunks of anything before using this or it will get stuck in the attachment head and stink later on if you don't clean it after every use! A good starting extractor in the Auto detailing world if you don't want to spend $500+ on an industrial one.Good for light to medium jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bissell carpet/upholstery cleaner that was great. This one has problems. The hose is difficult to use because of the manner it's attached to the unit. The brush tool is too small and the plastic cover allows carpet fibers and dirt to seep into the sides. Why would they not make that part snap off so you could clean the disgusting dog matter and carpet fibers from the tool? The rubber piece in the bottom of the receiving tank falls off easily and allows all the filthy water to spill......so be very careful when you lift it out. It seems to absorb odors no matter how quickly you clean the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: I vacuumed for fifteen minutes and there was maybe an ounce or two of dirty water that got sucked up
customer_reviews.text: worthless. there is no suction at all. I vacuumed for fifteen minutes and there was maybe an ounce or two of dirty water that got sucked up. meanwhile my couch cushion is soaked and I have to figure out how to dry it.
customer_reviews.author: sfcity

customer_reviews.title: Have had several of these in past. Ordered this ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had several of these in past. Ordered this but did not use until a few days ago, detergent side leaked everywhere. Ordered replacement part because I had purchased it several months ago and not used until now, was too late to get a refund or a replacement. Learned a big lesson, always try it when you first get it to make sure nothing wrong. Thought I could trust Bissell for quality control, NEVER again.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Magic Cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little machine! It saved us more than $100 in having someone else come in to clean our couch. It was a little disgusting to see all the dirt come out of it, but also very satisfying at the same time. It is easy to assemble, use, and clean. Totally worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: DVD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is in our kitchen, so a very high-traffic area and I have three boys who “forget” to take their shoes off. I used to have a “normal” shampooed, but they’re heavy & take up a lot of space, so I got this instead. Y’all, look at that clean side vs dirty side. Speaks for itself. Took me about 30 minutes to do a whole runner and only used one tank of water/solution. It was nice to show this to the kids (and husband, ugh) and prove that this is why you don’t wear shoes in the house!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: ORDER THIS IF YOU HAVE DOGS/PUPPIES
customer_reviews.text: Read no further reviews! This little green machine is my life saver! Every so often my dogs go through a phase where they decide to use the bathroom in the house and this thing is SO HELPFUL. Now this is gross but I immediately any remaining urine that cannot be soaked up. Then use the Bissell solution let it sit. The suction the solution back up. THEN I top it off with Nature’a Miracle Dog Urine stain and odor remove and I LEAVE it on the carpet to dry! This has been the best combination and I am so pleased the with results!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Brought our couches back to life!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! My wife and I have been playing with the idea of getting new couches for some time. Old ones have apple juice stains and the like from our two boys. We decided to get this to clean them instead and I am so glad we did! Our couches look like new and it is really simple to use. Knowing we can always break it out and clean them again is a huge relief too. I’ve already used it on the rug in our kids room as well. I can’t speak to pet stuff, but if your couches are covered in apple juice, marker, crushed cheese crackers, and toddler snot, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Must have for let owners, wine drinkers, Cheeto eaters etc
customer_reviews.text: This things is amazing. I got this originally to get the cat pee off my couch...but ever since I got this I've cleaned my car, my boyfriend's car, my carpet, my couch, my matress, you name it bro. It will get wine, oil, blood, cat pee, mysterious stains on your matress, that cheeto powder off pretty much anything. It's super satisfying to clean with it too. The detergent it comes with works pretty well too. I don't understand why more people have this!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Easy to use; cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: This works great! It does require a little elbow grease to really remove the liquid (and I hung the rugs out to dry on the back patio for a few minutes after), but I was very impressed by how well it cleaned the dog mess (fur, slobber, pumpkin cube residue) that a normal/pet vac cannot. It’s not too heavy, doesn’t leak, and was easy to assemble. I remember my parents having the 90s version of this around when I was little, and this new version is even easier to use than I remember. Solution is reasonably priced, cleanup was simple, and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin A

customer_reviews.title: You’re 100% getting your moneys worth. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best money I’ve spent in a LONG TIME. Definitely the best investment I’ve made on a home product. I have used it for puppy pee and toddler pee. Poop spot clean up, car shampooing, kids staining the carpet with magic markers, slime, cleaning entry way rugs (such a pain to wash those!) Honestly, I used this literally 4 times in one night last week. It’s definitely something you will get your money out of if you have a pet or child. The suction could be better, but it works well and does do the job. I’m truly looking for some critique here. But if you manage your expectations on a machine of this price, it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: A neatfreak's dream
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing already. Just got it today, spent the afternoon cleaning my six dining room chairs. It was a lot of work but so worth it -- photo is the filth that came out of them. The unit is easy to figure out, easy to use, even easy to clean up afterwards. Just expect to put some elbow grease into sucking the deep crud out. Planning to attack some old stains in my carpet next. Wish I'd bought this thing years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Grid

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!! We bought this mainly to use on our stairs and couches because the other carpet cleaning machine is too big. My husband and I love it. The setup was really easy and only took a couple minutes. It is pretty loud but that was to be expected. Our other carpet cleaner was noisier. It works so well that we ended up just cleaning our whole living room with it because it works better than our current machine. The powerful suction keeps the carpet from staying wet for too long after use and it was even able to get out some stains that our other carpet cleaner could not. I highly recommend this cleaner for big or small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: Urine - AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a pretty clean person. That’s why the minute I got this product I peed on my carpet. This was after a night of drinking wine and a morning of drinking coffee - very odorous. The machine soaked up every. single. drop. Leaving a 5 star review!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madster

customer_reviews.title: Great little device for spot cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable little device for cleaning spots on carpets. It's easy to assemble and easy to use and works well. It's only for spot cleaning as it's very much a hands-on-knees job, as opposed to an entire carpet, but it works really well on animal related stains. My dog's nails were clipped to the quick after being groomed, and she bled all over the Berber carpet. This device picked up the blood stains nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooo disappointed in this product. I had high hopes based on reviews but it is fairly weak and sucking and did little to improve. Tried it multiple times. Would return if I could :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lee S. Esmond

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected! Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Having pets, my couch has been subjected to quite a beating. It was soiled, had water ring marks from previous cleanings, drool, etc. I bought this after it was recommended in a pet group and seeing other photos in the reviews here. I immediately used it once it arrived and am astounded at how well it did. Even after several passes, the water was still pulling up brown but I didn’t want to oversaturate the couch so I will be doing another cleaning eventually. Even still, this before and after from the first use makes this little green machine worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing amazing! This is just one thing ive used my little green on, this is my stuffed shark i had as a little girl... (20 years ago) its been through alot lol ive always been to scared to try to wash it for fear of ruining it but i took a chance on the little green as opposed to putting it in a washing machine or trying to scrub and soak it and these were my results. Im in shock ! It was so easy and only took me 10 minutes to do the entire thing. 10/10 dont think about it just buy it! U wont regret it :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for small carpet stains and spots
customer_reviews.text: kids spills and elderly cat who coughs up hairballs and forgets sometimes where litter box is.. wife was looking for something we could do between the monthly professional cleanings.. works good, came in factory box with instructions, easy to read and easy to set up.. only had small bottle of cleaner so buy those also... the pet cleaner works great... only had it a little over a week. the cleaner side has markings for how much cleaner and how much water to add.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carpet cleaner, I follow with it after I use a drill brush and carpet shampoo and I get amazing results, the suction is really good on it, and it is very easy to clean. The only downsides to this product is the hose could be another 3ft. And itd be amazing, another is the stored water tank could be a little bigger as I was having to refill a lot doing a car, but I just kept a gallon of water next to me to solve that issue, but all in all I would buy it again and I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: IT SUCKS THAT IT DOESN'T SUCK
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't suck up anything loses complete suction after the first time use. if you want a carpet cleaner get a real carpet cleaner this little thing doesn't clean anything it's more of a novelty item for housewives that'll never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer!!!! I have kids, two dogs, and a white couch. Prior to buying this I was so stressed about trying to keep the couch clean. It had some stains I had tried everything on that just weren’t budging and I was contemplating buying a new couch all together. Then I found this bissell and let me tell you! It got the allll the lingering stains out and has tackled every mess that I’ve tested it on. I’m talking marker, mud, pudding, coffee just to name a few. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gilman

customer_reviews.title: You are not able to clean the reservoir so it’s garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great! But do not buy it. We had a blue machine I wish I knew the name, bought at big lots, worked wonderful, we left water in it and it froze. This one the side that collects the dirty water is not accessible and fills with dirt and mold. Horrible product, unless you Want to use it once. It’s a 15 Minute process to get it kinda clean. They need to make a new container and replace everyone. Again do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: chris hanley

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't notice huge cleaning action from this, but we'll keep it since we have a new puppy. Doesn't take up too much space, so that's a plus. We bought the pre treat spray AND the Boost cleaning fluid but I'm still not overly impressed with the before and afters. Maybe our stuff just wasn't that dirty to begin with vs. some of the other before and afters I saw?!
customer_reviews.author: E. V. Killeen

customer_reviews.title: Great for spots and stairs
customer_reviews.text: I decided to clean my area rugs with this and I was absolutely amazed at how nasty the water was afterwards. As long as you go over the wet area at least twice with just suction, it picks up quite a bit of water. A friend knew I was cleaning all my rugs and let me borrow her portable Hoover pet carpet cleaner and I ended up cleaning the same rug again with the Hoover. The water came up completely black. I was upset because I had just cleaned the rug with this little cleaner less than a day prior. All in all, this little guy is powerful but it should probably only be used for spot cleaning and stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gennifer11

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT YOU CAN BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product you can get for the price. It certainly does exactly as it advertises and it is 100% worth the price point. You can use this on furniture carpet your car's interior pretty much anything you can find. This is the 3rd one I have bought 1 for my mom 1 for my dad and the 3rd for me.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: This Bissell is going to be busy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I bought this when I did because straight out of the box, my son spilled a drink on my brand new rug!! It all came up perfectly. The next day, my dog had an accident of the same rug and out came the Bissell again! Two days later, my son cut his toe and got blood on my cream colored couch (I’m not making this up!), the Bissell cleaned everything really well. My only compliant, if I must, is the suction seems light. It took a full day to completely dry these areas. Overall, I’m glad I have this lil machine! No doubt it’s going to be put to work in this household!
customer_reviews.author: K.Rich

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS. It is a  waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a carpet and upholstery cleaner. I cannot comment on the performance of this on carpets. We have no carpets at all; we have only wood and tile floors so we purchased this to clean upholstery. It just does not work at all. We have owned several other Bissell products in the past and have generally been satisfied with our purchases. We are totally disappointed with the performance of this product. Unfortunately the return window expired before I even opened the box. Lesson learned; try a product as soon as you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Cubfanbob

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for such a low grade performance
customer_reviews.text: I had expectations for a small but powerful unit to be used for spot cleaning. Unfortunately this is not that unit. This unit does NOT produce steam. It sprays the water you heat beforehand and filled the tank with. And you cannot use boiling water. It does not have any heating unit inside. Suction is pretty low grade. Cannot recommend for deep cleaning. Overall performance is "meh".
customer_reviews.author: Waltona M.

customer_reviews.title: Received USED Product... but works well
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first when I first recieved this product because it was obviously USED (still had leftover water in reservoirs), and I paid for a new one. But, regardless, for the size, convenience, and price this cleaner is amazing. It cleaned up my WHITE microfiber couches very nicely and got some stubborn stains out of my carpet. The cord could be longer for convenience but it's not a huge issue. Make sure to follow the instructions for use and care and you should be very happy with it. I make sure to clean the canisters with hot water and bleach and let them air dry after use to prevent any mildew/musky smell with the next cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for couches and upholstery. it has a small nozzle , so obviously if you have big couches it will take some time do you get them nice and clean, and you want to make sure to soak up all of the water otherwise my couches left a little residue puddles. Are there was a does a great job of taking out the dirt you can see the muddy water right when you’re vacuuming it up. use this with the bissle solution
customer_reviews.author: AmazinMomma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have two kids and two cats. Someone is always leaving an unpleasant surprise on my carpets. This allows us to spot clean instead of storing a giant carpet cleaner or renting one constantly. I especially loved the hose cleaning feature. No more putting away a grimy cleaner or tearing the whole thing apart to clean it. Just a quick flush of the hose and you’re done!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical. My dog was not feeling well and started relieving himself on our bedroom rug. I had tried multiple spray cleaners and techniques but couldn’t get the smell out. I was convinced I’d need to get rid of my rug and this was my last shot. I honestly thought I’d have to return it. Nope!! Easy to assemble. Easy to use and clean. I used it with the pet cleaning solution. My rug is clean and odor free!!! I posted the picture of the filthy liquid from after the cleaning. I’m excited to use this on my couch and in my car now. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four out of five stars because the first product I got , had cracks and broken pieces as if someone dropped it and put it in the box. They did send me a replacement so I’m glad that worked out under those circumstances. I used this for my bed, and a few different cars. It does great! Sure, there is better out there where you wouldn’t have to do as much passes on stuff but if you prep before shampooing like your own scrubbing to bring up the dirt, it does good! No complaints. For the price you can’t beat it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tylyn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Buy something bigger!  Way to small/no power
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised to be useful for cleaning cars, small spaces. But the hose is so short you can't reach anything? Also, it has a very low suction. It really lacks any power to pull out the water it deposits while cleaning. Very disappointing purchase. I logged on to return it (only tried to use 3x's), only to discover return window was only 30 days! Grr! Wasted $$
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great for spots. Hard to use on a floor rug if you're older
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this is easy to clean. I have long hated bigger systems because using them is very time intensive. I wish that Bissel offered an extension wand for the system so you could stand and do spots on the rug (I have arthritis - damn hard to get up when gravity still works LOL). The suction power is on par with what I'd expect from a small system. Not really sure about "deep cleaning" - you may have to do an area twice. Having said that it's a fair price for a good product
customer_reviews.author: Trish Telesco

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine! With little people and a dog in the house our couches and chairs get filthy pretty quickly. This works so well, especially on a fabric footstool that I was about ready to throw away until it went through a deep cleaning with the green machine. It does a fantastic job on all of our upholstered surfaces. I did use it once on the carpet for a spot and I wasn’t as impressed with its dirt/stain removing, I think I’ll stick to our true carpet cleaner for that task. It seems to work best on low pile material like a couch or pillow. Very easy to use and clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: LauraLee

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to remove the little bottle of cleaning solution from the tank before using!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how well it works and how easy it is to use, once I figured it out for myself. The included directions are not well presented and are incomplete IMHO. For instance, no warning of the fact that the cleaning solution sample bottle is placed inside one of the tanks--which I did not discover until after I had used it! However, once figuring out how to use, I am very happy with how well I can keep up with spots that result from spill, pets, and tracking in schmutz from outside.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Gailey

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this long ago
customer_reviews.text: My cat peed on the rug, I brought this Bissell spot cleaner out and for the first time ever I felt like I got all of it up. I've only used it twice so far because I've only had it for a couple of weeks, but I can't figure out why I waited until my cat was 18 years old to get one. It's easy to set up, easy to use, lightweight. Has powerful suction and the top of the cleaning wand is clear so you can see the fluid getting sucked into the machine so you know when you've got it all. I'm glad I got it and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a new puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy is being toilet trained but sometimes goes on our rug - this Bissell (and a black light!) has been super helpful to break him of that habit!! I found all of his marked spots, and he stopped going in the house in about a week! The cost of this little device was definitely worth it just for the puppy toilet training, but also useful for when I drop food on the couch (which happens way more often to my husband’s chagrin). I’ve recommended it to all of the other new puppy moms!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself in one use
customer_reviews.text: I'm always doing whatever I can to keep my rugs and mattress clean, especially as a pet owner. After I realized hiring a professional cleaner to come once is around 100$ and renting a unit for 25$ a usage didn't make any sense, I went and bought this cleaning unit. Now I have clean carpets and a fresh mattress wherever I want. Now if I could just hire someone to do my chores...
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this little thing. I’ve been burned before by Bissell spot cleaners but this one is awesome. Very easy to put together and the dirty water container is easier to rinse out than others have been. I had a few spots on my rugs that I couldn’t get out and this little guy got em. Very happy with this. I also used it on my couch, which is what I had intentionally bought it for, and was disgusted by what came out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Short & Sweet
customer_reviews.text: My Lab puppy refuses to be house broken, and the first few months I had her she had ongoing diarrhea. I tried the pet store sprays but the Bissell has been a miracle. I wish the nozzle was easier to clean but that's my only quibble. Looking forward to cleaning high use areas that have gotten gray.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Kuffel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Foster pets and kids
customer_reviews.text: We foster dogs once a month and our home is 90% carpet. I bought this to clean up pee spots and it works great so far. I’ve used it three separate times, the first was a huge area where there were a few pee spots but also heavy foot traffic. Worked great. The second time I saw an area where there was definitely a pee spot but also maybe something spilled. It worked great there. And the last spot is the hallway which is heavily trafficked and it worked great there too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It was really simple to put together - it comes with directions. It does a thorough job cleaning. My couch didn’t look dirty but the dirty water bin was pretty gross. It comes with a sample bottle of the cleaning solution too. It’s light weight, you have to refill it once if you’re doing the couch. A small chair only needs one bucket. The amount of water left behind depends on how much you spray out and how patient you are with the vacuum. The inside of the vacuum brush is difficult to get clean which is the only downfall to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I'm Stair-Legal Again!
customer_reviews.text: My sixties surprised me by making it more difficult to wield household machines with my former Hulk-like strength and effortless Tallchieva-like grace. I was honestly afraid of losing my balance while trying to clean stairs with my regular carpet steamer. This little machine not only solved that problem, it holds enough solution and water to get through the entire flight of stairs and has a special cap that allows you to rinse the inside of the hose without taking it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: just DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve been thinking about splurging and getting this, just DO IT. I bought this to deep clean my couches and area rug. Little did I know a week later my toddler would spill half a gallon of paint on my floor! After scooping up what I could I using this vacuum to suck up and clean the rest out and I am SO IMPRESSED! I honestly thought my carpet was done for and we’d be replacing it. But you seriously cannot even tell! So stop questioning and just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet owners or cleaning fanatics
customer_reviews.text: I love this carpet cleaner!! It's perfect for cleaning up pet messes or taking your OCD to the next level. It's not a professional deep clean, but it really makes a difference. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't look like the clear part of the nozzle can be taken apart for cleaning, as some dog hair has been collecting in the corners which is annoying to me but it doesn't impact the efficiency yet. The instructions recommend vacuuming the spot prior to cleaning but when you're cleaning up a pee mess, I don't vacuum it first. Overall fantastic product, very portable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Breana  R. Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Cleaner for Pets
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner works. I've used it many times while training my chihuahua. With the right cleaning solution, it leaves no smell behind. The suction power is more than adequate and remains that way as long as you keep the nozzle clean, which can be a pain if you wait tok long between cleaning. Also, I read the reviews of people saying the fill tank spills. Yes it does, if you remove it improperly. And make sure you do so outside just to be sure. It's not that hard people.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It leaks from the clean water tank.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is handy if you have pets and/or stairs in your home, but I’m giving it three stars because this is the second portable Bissell carpet cleaner I’ve owned (I recently got rid of an older model) and the machine still leaks, like, a lot. Am I doing something wrong here? It leaks from the very bottom through a seal where two parts meet. The water leaking is from the clean water tank. If you get this, again, it is very handy and I’m glad I have it, but be aware that it will leak on you.
customer_reviews.author: Shared

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on my couch
customer_reviews.text: I had a kitty who was peeing on my couch. This did a great job of removing the urine and lots of other dirt I didn’t even realize was in there. Takes a while for the sprayer to fully spray water, probably 1-2 minutes from beginning to use it, but does eventually work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and a foster puppy, needless to say, they make a mess. My couch is beige so everything shows. I had new stains on it from the puppy and old stains that were 4 years old. This shampooer got them all out. I wish I had taken a before pic to show how HORRIBLE the stains were. But my couch looks BRAND NEW now. Love it. Next I'm going to shampoo my car. I definitely recommend it along with the Boost Pet Oxy cleaning enhancer.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down to one of the best purchase I have ever made! Total game changer which can be used to clean anything and everything starting from the mattress, sofa, rugs and carpet. My mattress is like day one and got rid of all spots. Big money safer since it avoids having to replace furniture and gives you the cleanest smell at home. I recommended to my sister and she is totally in love as well. When I asked her to describe the feeling after is was:“it feels like I did was my house in the laundry!“
customer_reviews.author: meisam

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever. Do not believe these good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a “0” star I would. It’s a joke. I used it one time and hoped I was imagining how awful of a job it did. Nope, it sucked the second time as well. The water tank empties out as the dirt water tank isn’t even a 1/4th full. So, in other words, it’s just spitting water into my carpet and not sucking anything up! It’s a complete waste of money and now I can’t even return it because it’s past the 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: alex williams

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for homes with pets
customer_reviews.text: Great for my messy kitties! One of the two has IBS, and thus vomits a lot, and the other has an affinity for scooting his butt across the carpet like a dog. This little machine cleans all their messes quickly and effectively. The nozzle does get clogged with hair and lint, as others have mentioned, but a quick google search showed me how to clean that out.
customer_reviews.author: Spookycloud

customer_reviews.title: Decent upholstery cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little upholstery cleaner. The day I received it, I used it to clean the seats in my car and it removed stains as well as the dreaded water marks. I did think that it would suck the water out of the fabric more than it did. The suction was not as powerful as I assumed and the intake is a very small slit so you have to press hard and go over and over the same areas to remove the water/moisture when cleaning. Over all, it’s easy to use, and should be useful around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great little powerful cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this machine on Amazon in 2010 (and it’s still working) I am only writing my review today after my adult daughter used it to clean the seats in her car. See the video for an idea of how much dirt it removed from her car seats. It’s a great little machine. We don’t use it to much anymore since we replaced the majority of the carpet in our home with laminate flooring. But we used it a lot for the first few years we had the machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I was only able to clean by the door step because my wrist began hurting so badly. Just can’t see myself doing it again for a while until my wrist heals. Requires a lot of strength pushing it deep into the carpet to suck out as much fluid as you can. That way it dries faster. This is definitely a spot cleaner. Get a real big vacumm cleanse for larger spots. Really want to clean my white sofa too but will wait bevause wrist...hurts now
customer_reviews.author: Keela

customer_reviews.title: Am super annoyed with how fast it turned
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this vacuum at first but then it started smelling really badly and have not been able to get the smell out since. Am super annoyed with how fast it turned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much we have two
customer_reviews.text: We had a previous generation which lasted years! So we purchased this to replace it. Well built and easy to use. I really think there should be a way to incorporate a removable cover for thoroughly cleaning the inside of the clean and dirty water reservoirs. We have two of these we like them so much. One at home and one in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of cleaning regular spills and spots.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for about a month, but I've used it at least a dozen times already. I've got a four year old who makes plenty of messes, and this is easy to carry wherever those messes occur. It's got decent suction, and a pretty good capacity. I just fill it with hot water and it cleans pretty much everything. Maybe use a pretreating carpet spray if you've got a rough spot, but it works great for regular spots and spills.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a carpet cleaning business for 14 years , some few years ago. I do not have a lot of carpet, just needed to spot clean a few rooms. This little machine is GREAT, has a lot power and does a great job. I will be using it on my furniture and carpet in the car. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great portable cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this little green cleaner, and I am extremely happy with my purchase (thank you, reviewers!). It is powerful, relatively quiet, and easy to move around. It is particularly useful on stairs and furniture. The Bissell cleaning solutions all smell very nice - not overpowering. I would highly recommend this portable cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Hoop Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good for its affordable price
customer_reviews.text: It does fine for its price. Dont expect deep cleaning power. It has just enough power to pull off surface grime. It will pull up some stuff from the sofa foam, but if you dont keep repeating the process, youll just leave the nasty on the surface. I suggest using some cheaper all purpose cleaner firat and do your soaking, cleaning etc and then follow-up with a lot of water spray and suction to clean it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for it's size
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well for small jobs. I cleaned a stained area in the headliner of my RV. Very pleased with the results. Be careful to keep the unit level. When the dirty water tank gets full it can leak if the unit is not perfectly level.
customer_reviews.author: nik

customer_reviews.title: Needed one and the unit suffices with a few shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged & delivered promptly. Just used heavily for 2 days with multiple dark cat urine 'events' on an antique white bedspread. With some time and pretreating the urine spots with an 'Oxi-Clean Odor Blasters' powder/water mix BEFORE using the solution in the solution tank, it fully removed the ammonia stink & most all of the staining. 2 HUGE suggestions... 1. increase the vacuum suction! 2. engineer a stiffer/fuller wand brush! Bristles far too soft & few and far between!
customer_reviews.author: G.J.MacK

customer_reviews.title: Same Result as.... Using soapy water/scrub brush.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something a lot more high quality. This accomplished the same result you would get from using a bucket of warm water with soap while using the same amount of physical effort to clean. Even with the vacuum feature you exert more energy than you should have to scrubbing to get dirt up.
customer_reviews.author: ChadWick

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan since my item was defective
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised this got such great reviews. It arrived quick only for me to find out my black top cap and straw were defective and water and solution leaked everywhere. Not to mention the clean water bucket was wet when I initially opened it so I’m assuming they attempted to send me a “refurbished” item. But after cleaning up the mess, I decided to try it. Maybe good for small projects but this just made my stain worse so I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cusati

customer_reviews.title: Works well, then breaks.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner was really great for the first two months I owned it. I have dogs that occasionally have accidents in the house, and it's so much more convenient to pull this out instead of a large floor cleaner. It really left the spots on the floor visibly clean, and storage was simple and easy. However, after the second month something happened and it just started leaking from the bottom of the unit. Which is really unfortunate because I loved using this thing. I'm currently contacting the manufactures to see if I can get his repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: I would consider myself a pretty clean person but this thing deep cleans dirt that’s been sitting on the surface and building up over time! I’m attaching a video of what came out of our 5x7 area rug.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Made my light colored couch, even lighter!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit. I have an off white couch and I bought this because someone spilled some pesto on it leaving a nasty stain. After doing that one spot, I noticed a visible difference between where I had used the bissell and the rest of the couch. Not only had it completely got rid of the stain but the rest of the area was visibly brighter. Let me tell you, this thing sucks dirt from the deepest crevices of your couch. I couldn't believe how much dirt came out of what I thought was a pristine couch. Would highly recommend to anyone who wants a satisfying clean.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Does Amazing Jobs
customer_reviews.text: I had a case of coke that exploded in the back seat in the summer time. Bought the little machine and went to work and it takes some time and I had do it several times. This is one of the worse things I could imagine in a car. You must run the nozzle back and forth slowly and you will see the dirt coming up into the vacuum. Use very hot water in the tank because it helps but don't be disappointed when it doesn't magically come out. It is real work.
customer_reviews.author: xtremefilmer

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: Deeply satisfying to suck the dirt out of carpets and couches!! This little machine is a powerhouse of help for me. I don't have carpets, but I have an area rug in most rooms. I love he instant difference without soaking the carpet. Dries quickly
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: So far this has done exactly what I need it to. Our toddler’s milk and juice spills have wrought havoc on our carpet. Even after months of tracked dirt, most of the spots were removed in one use. The only con was the cleaner that amazon pairs with the product. I got the package with the additional cleaner suggested. Turns out that it’s only meant for upright cleaners. Why the f*** did amazon pair it with this cleaner, then?
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: It performed very well on my car carpet
customer_reviews.text: This is so far the best cleaner for the carpet and seats in my car. After several runs it removed some 15+ years old heavy oil/coke/who-knows-what stains from the carpet in my 1999 camry. It gets four stars only because I only had it for a month and don't know how long it's going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Bohr

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for what it’s designed to do!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spot cleaner!! Does exactly what it’s supposed to do!! I was hesitant to buy it because of the reviews, but I’m glad I did! I think anyone who has left negative reviews may not be using it correctly, may not have used a carpet cleaner before or maybe even their expectations are too high.. it’s a spot cleaner haha! But it’s awesome! I have a 14 year old cat with arthritis who has accidents sometimes. I also have a bunny. This spot cleaner is perfect for when they have accidents or if I spill something. I love that I can spot clean my comforter without having to wash the whole thing. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a spot cleaner for my couch and mattress. This product had so many great reviews, and we loved it at first. It wasn't really good with old stains or slime stains, but for newer, lighter stains it worked great. About 3 months into using it, the vacuum lost suction. Now I'm left with wet furniture. We also cleaned the vacuum after each use and made sure everything was dry before putting it back together. Still haven't been able to fix the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for cleaning car upholstery. We removed the seats from our beater car which was completely destroyed when we bought it and it really picked the dirt and stains out. Not 100% but I wasn’t expecting that. I used a drink brush first and some AWESOME brand cleaner from dollar tree before using this and that combination worked really well. Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! I should have bought this years ago. Light weight and a perfect savior for cleaning stairs. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that cleaning the end of the hose is impossible. It traps residue along the inside edges and you can't clean it out. I can't call it an "attachment" because it's not removable. A serious design flaw. Other than that, it's perfect for what I purchased it for, my stairs, and spot cleaning after my doggies. Beware though, it's very narrow so be sure to only purchase it for spot cleaning. If you want to use it for larger jobs be prepared to spend LOTS of time doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff's Copilot

customer_reviews.title: just buy it if you are looking for a spot cleaner
customer_reviews.text: works great. I ran out of cleaning liquid and I used plain water to clean the stains and it worked wonderfully. I did return it though because I realized after purchasing this that I needed a full carpet cleaner not a spot remover because only in 2 days of owning this machine my fingers were numb and hurting because I was using it on bigger areas than just on spots.
customer_reviews.author: Khan_Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Working great for what we use it for spot cleaningon area rugs and furniture. I did use this for my carpet car mats and they can out great. However it does leak somewhat but I think this is because the water level got too high. It will keep using it and see if this is the case. For the price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Figs

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability of it! It cleans good. Suction is good, but could be alittle better. Easy to use. The scrubber head should come apart to clean, but doesn’t. All in all...I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as we have a toddler and she has destroyed our couch. We decided to buy this and try it out and if it didn’t work we’d get a new couch. Now we don’t need a new couch. It’s super easy, quick, and satisfying. I recommend this highly!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: I thought my results would be comparable to my carpet cleaner's attachments, but it is not. I really wanted to used this product on my furniture and stairs but the suction is just not as powerful and I get better results using my larger carpet cleaner's attachments.
customer_reviews.author: nubonics

customer_reviews.title: The pictures tell it all !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing ! It cleaned my couch way better than I expected. I have a toddler so my couch has gotten stained really bad over the years . I didn’t want to pay to get it cleaned professional because that would be too much. I’m so glad I found this product . It’s amazing . I posted a before pic , a picture during the process and the final results. You can see for yourself how well this machine works.
customer_reviews.author: Bria L

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! Couches look great, carpet better, a knocked over cup of coffee quickly cleaned up on carpet. I’m kind of obsessed w it now that I know how clean everything can be (& easy to do it) Update: it did start leaking after some time. I just put it in a laundry basket on top of folded up towel to soak up the leAking (dirty) fluid..🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Antolino

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We just got a new puppy.... my son's second second attempt at "Please mom, I swear I'll take care of it" The first puppy he had ruined the carpet and I ended up having to replace the pad and carpet in the entire house...ugh So when I said yes to this new puppy, I found this online and bought it immediately. It has been a godsend. It's super easy to use and lightweight. My son is 14, almost 15 so hopefully with the help of this new tool, he can enjoy his puppy instead of listening to me complain about accidents all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Meredith-Cubero

product_meta.title: Bissell Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner, 1400B, Green
product_meta.description:
Color:Green| Style Name:Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner

Bissell Little Green Multi-Purpose Compact Deep Cleaner

Strong spray and suction contains at least 50% recycled plastic. 3 inch stain tool helps you scrub stains away.



Dimensions: 13.8 pounds Check for suction at the back of the unit after removing the hose where it attaches to the back of the unit. If there IS suction at the back of the machine with the hose removed, follow these steps: Unplug the unit from the outlet. Check the Pre- and Post-Motor filters for debris. Dirty filters can restrict airflow. The Pre-Motor Foam Filter is square. You can find it in a pull-out tray under the Dirt Tank. The Foam Filter may be hand washed in cold water with mild detergent. Reinstall the filter when it’s completely dry. The Multi-Layer Post-Motor Filter is rectangular. It can be found on the side of the machine. *Note: The white Multi-Layer Post Motor Filter isn’t washable. Make sure the dirt tank is empty. Check the upper tank for build-up or clogs. If it needs to be cleaned, use a short, Phillips-head screwdriver and take off the separator plate with a cloth (can be dampened with water or mild detergent). Replace dirt tank. Check for good suction at the end of the upholstery hose. If there’s good suction, make sure the hose is connected firmly to the lower hose on the back of the vacuum. If there’s no suction, check the hose for splits, cracks, or clogs. Make sure the Brush Roll is rotating. If it isn’t, take the access plate off and examine the brush and belt for damage. The access panel can be taken off by lifting the four tabs on the bottom of your machine. Clearing clogs detach the Upper Hose from the machine. Insert a broomstick into the hose to push any obstruction through. Remove the screw from the left side of the lower hose on the back of the unit. Straighten this section of hose by pulling it down or laying the unit on its side with the lower hose towards the top side. Look through the hose for any obstruction. Use a broomstick to unclog the hose. Power source - corded. Power rating: 3 amps.
feature_bullets: Buy Bissell, save pets; Bissell donates up to 10 dollars to the Bissell pet foundation for every pet product purchase, upon activation
Tackles tough spots and stains with strong spray and powerful suction
Take on small and large cleanups with this compact carpet cleaner
Removable water tanks for easy filling and emptying; Tank capacity 48 ounces
Use the hydro rinse tool attachment to easily clean out the hose after each use
Clean set in stains with the trial size spot & stain formula and 3" tough stain tool

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,302 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
